No. 199940)} Sub: Amendment in General Financial Rule (GFR), 2017- Acceptance of Electronic Bank Guarantee (e-BG) reg: In Supersession of Policy Circular No. 3.1.36/2022 dated 05.12.2022 and in compliance to Ministry of Road Transport & Highways letter no. NH-35014/20/2020-H dated 12.08.2022 (Annexure-I) forwarded the Ministry of Finance (Department of Expenditure) OM no. F.1/4/2022-PPD dated 05.08.2022 regarding amendments in the Rule 170() and Rule 171(i) of General Financial Rules 2017 related to "Bid Security and Performance Security' MoRTH has also requested all the implementing agencies of MoRTH & PWDs of States/UTs dealing with National Highways works to accept only Electronic Bank Guarantee in place of Physical Bank Guarantees: 2_ In light of above, it has now been decided to accept the Bid Security and Performance Security in for form of Insurance Surety Bonds, Account Payee Demand Draft, Fixed Deposit Receipt, Banker' $   Cheque or Bank Guarantee (including e-Bank Guarantee) with immediate effect: The relevant existing clauses vis-a-vis amended clauses of the standard documents for EPC, HAM and BOT (Toll) Project may change accordingly for necessary compliance by all concerned. 3_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: Encl:: As stated above (CS.
